name: Bloodhounds
description: In 2023, two young boxers team up to bring down a ruthless loan shark and his criminal empire in a gritty action-packed drama.

name: Kabhi Mai Kabhi Tum
description: A family drama revolving around love, betrayal, and relationships, where bonds are tested in trying times.

name: Extracurricular
description: A high school student becomes involved in a dangerous criminal world to earn money and faces unexpected consequences.

name: Mamla Legal Hai
description: An Indian comedy series centered around a dysfunctional legal team that handles absurd cases with a hilarious twist, blending satire and courtroom drama.

name: Ms. Marvel
description: Kamala Khan, a young Pakistani-American teen, discovers her superpowers while juggling her family, school, and identity as Ms. Marvel.

name: Love 020
description: A Chinese romantic drama where a talented computer science student, Bei Weiwei, gets noticed by the most popular guy on campus, who is also an expert in online gaming.

name: Never Have I Ever
description: A coming-of-age comedy-drama about an Indian-American teenager dealing with the pressures of high school, her family, and her complicated love life.

name: Serious Men
description: Tormented with his underprivileged societal status, a man spins a web of lies to gain social standing and live a better life through his son.

name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
description: Jake Peralta, an immature but talented NYPD detective, must learn to work with a by-the-book captain.
